channel.title: The personal website of Felipe de Souza
channel.description: Recent content on The personal website of Felipe de Souza

item.title: Lucid Dreaming
item.description: It was another sunny day in Rio de Janeiro, and as always, after class I would meet my friend Daniel for our traditional Parkour training. We walked from school to our homes, we were very methodical and we always did the same route, but whenever we went to practice one of Parkour's most classic vaults: King Kong * I failed miserably ... days and days trying and always locking And it was on a Tuesday night that I discovered a method for practicing any vault without leaving home.

item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: Painted Cakes Do Not Satisfy Hunger Some of the texts that has affected my thinking + some that I’m currently reading. Organized Ram-Dass-Like. Books that I hang with all the time, Books that I visit with now & then, Books I'm glad I met,
